ohe aathata pawena me sulanga....hemihita aatha indan aran enawa mage punchi kumarige suwanda...dannawada man me suwandata kochchara aadareyida kiyala....oyata puluwani nam awith poddak kana thiyanna..mage me hadawathata..aheyi katawath ahenne nathi wenna kiyana aadare...mathakayida api hamu wuna ee dawasa...punchi ha patiyek wage diwwa oya...muwaththiyak wage as deka...m..kohoma kiyannada nil tharu as deka gana...oya ahinsaka punchi hitha...mata thama mathakayi...ira sandu thiyenathak kal mata inna thiyenawa nam oya punchi ukule....ape me aadareta man harima aadareyi...dannawada mage punchi kelle...man kochchara aadareda kiyala....

nidahasen pasu nirmanaya wu prathama jathika kodiye pradhana lakshanaya wuye parani sinhala dhajayata wam pasin kola ya rambaa paha siras pati dekak ya kota ek kirima ya.thawada ee pati deka ha rathu rujukonaghraya athara kaha patiyak da samastha kodiya watema kaha paha pati siraswa ha thiraswa yedimada sidu wiya.mema kodiye kola ha thambaili (rambaa) pahathi siras pati samana palalakin yuktha ya.samastha kodiye thiras palalata,mema ek siras patiyaka palala darana anupathaya 1.7 we.enam mulu kodiye thiras palala kotas 7ta bedu wita (kola pahathi patiyata bahirawa athi kaha pata thiras patiye palala kotasa athahara) 1/7 palala pramanayak thiras kola ha thambaili patiwala wena wenama thibiya yuthu ya.pradarshanayata yoda ganu labana jathika kodiya, ehi salasma,diga palala, warnaya aadiya sambandhayen
